description: Mixed development to provide a)Medical Innovation Centre (12 100sq.m) b) Hall of residence and caretakers flat(72 units) c) Squash courts and multi-purpose hall d) office building (8 900sq.m.) (Applicants plan nos. 8741 SK6/4C 5C 6B 8B 9A 11 12.) Alteration to conditions 04  07  08 to planning permission dated 7th February  1989 (ref: 88/1331).
decision_conditions: CONDITION 04 TO READ:- The office floor space hereby approved shall not be occupied until the Medical Innovation Centre and student accomodation has been constructed to eaves level. CONDITION 07 TO READ:- No part of each separate element of the approved development shall be occupied or used before the loading, timing and vehicle access facilities relating to that element as shown on the approved drawings have been constructed and they shall thereafter be retained for the purposes so approved unless otherwise agreed by the Local Planning Authority. CONDITION 08 TO READ:- No part of each separate element of the approved development shall be occupied until the whole of the parking accomodation relating to that separate element as shown on the approved drawings has been constructed to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. . REASONS: The reasons relating to conditions 04, 07 and 08 remain as shown in the decision notice dated 7th February, 1989.
